alert.note: Alert for Pawnee; Richardson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 9:12AM CDT until July 29 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Richardson County in southeastern Nebraska... Eastern Pawnee County in southeastern Nebraska... * Until 1000 AM CDT. * At 912 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles west of Stella to 4 miles north of Bern, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Dawson around 915 AM CDT. Verdon and Salem around 920 AM CDT. Falls City around 925 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Rulo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
